title: Following
description: Alden thinks he witnessed a murder, but when the dead girl turns up alive, he must figure out the truth in this chilling novel Alden likes to follow people. He's not trying to be a creep, he just wants to be an investigator some day, and it's good practice.But spying on people comes with risks...like seeing popular Greg Matthews seemingly murder his girlfriend, Amy, behind the school.But the facts aren't adding up, especially because Amy turns up a few days later...alive.
